request_pathways.name: Authorization to Use or Disclose Health Information
Fax submission to Robert Packer Hospital HIM
Mail to One Guthrie Square, Sayre PA 18840
In-person delivery (no onsite support at Corning; Robert Packer Hospital office)

access_pathway.primary_pathway_description: Patient downloads a generic system-wide HIPAA authorization PDF, prints and handwrites it, then faxes or mails it to Robert Packer Hospital HIM department.

red_flags: Sensitive information (drug/alcohol, HIV, mental health) defaults to release via opt-out rather than opt-in
Requests last 4 digits of SSN, which is unnecessary for patient access
No onsite medical records support at Corning Hospital; patients directed to Robert Packer Hospital in Sayre, PA
bright_spots: Transparent HIPAA-compliant fee: $6.50 flat rate for personal-use electronic records
No charge for records sent to another healthcare provider
Three format options including electronic on-line delivery
Granular record type selection with radiology modality breakdown
Single-page form keeps patient burden low

findability.rationale: Level 5: Forms were prominently available via basic web search and directly downloadable from a well-organized central medical records page with no barriers.

technical_accessibility.rationale: Level 3: Form is a flat PDF with zero fillable fields requiring print-and-handwrite workflow, but fax submission is available as an electronic channel; usable digitally only with third-party annotation workarounds.

content_design.rationale: Level 4: Well-organized single-page form with numbered sections and logical flow; minor issues with dense layout, legalistic language, and critical submission info relegated to a separate document.

patient_centeredness.rationale: Level 3: A patient can use the generic authorization form by selecting 'Personal Use' as purpose, but the form was not designed for patient self-access and does not reference individual access rights under HIPAA.

compliance.rationale: Level 4: No notarization required, HIPAA-compliant fee structure, standard 12-month expiration, clear voluntary-nature language; minor issues include unnecessary SSN collection and opt-out default for sensitive information.

overall.summary: Guthrie Corning Hospital offers an easily findable, compliant records request process with transparent fees, but the non-fillable generic authorization form and lack of a dedicated patient access pathway place it in the mid-range of organizations studied.
